attributes.action: Lets stop murderers having human rights! Once you take a life, you choose for your human rights to be taken away!
attributes.additional_details: When somebody takes a life through murder they shouldn't be allowed to have human rights when in prison. Why should murderers be allowed home comforts such as televisions and cigarettes? They have taken someones life, who now can't take another breath nevermind sit and watch television with their families! Take away human rights from murderers so they can stop having all these home comforts in prison!
